resources.string: Your task is to get all of the bricks out of board.\n To do so, you can\'t let the ball fall down. As much as 3 lives should be more than enough to win one time. How long can you survive?
Controls:\n - press on lower screen sides or tilt your phone to move paddle left/right,\n - tap on top half of the screen to pause the game, tap anywhere to continue.

Bricks:
 - RED: normal bricks, just hit them,
 - BLUE: ice brick, requires two hits,
 - GREEN: slime brick, will slow down the ball,
 - YELLOW: fire brick, will speed up the ball.
